name: Fun With Mandarin Preschool and Daycare
description: Fun With Mandarin Preschool LLC is a Immersion preschool and care program for children 18 months and through entry into kindergarten. They offer two-day, three-day, and five-day schedules and rolling enrollment throughout the year, and have two locations in San Francisco.
